name: Maze Circus
description:
Maze Circus is a puzzle game, in wich you have to help Mr Dot to roll the ball into the center of the maze.

There is just one level, I made the game for The Weekly Game Jam.

You can download game for better resulution,

Inputs:

Rotate:  Q + E or Left/Right Arrow Key's

Move:   W + S or Arrow Key's

There is just one level, I made the game for The Weekly Game Jam.
